text: The modern Welsh language contains names for many towns and other geographical features in Great Britain and elsewhere. Names for places outside of Welsh- speaking regions are exonyms, not including spelling or pronunciation adaptions and translations of non-proper nouns. Names in italics are dated or obsolete. == Algeria == English name Welsh name Endonym Notes Algiers Alger الجزائر (al Jazā'ir) Dzayer Alger Borrowed from the French name. ==Argentina== Yr Ariannin
